original_title: West Indies Women to tour Sri Lanka for T20I series
original_body_lines: (SLC) - The West Indies National Women’s Team will arrive in Sri Lanka during the month of June for a white ball tour consisting of a three match ODI and a three-match T20I series.
The team will play the ODI series in GICS, Galle, while the T20I series will be played in MRICS, Hambantota.
